showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:1}); // Shinra, Inc.
Urban Dev. Research Library

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:4}); // Shinra, Inc.
Scientific Research Library

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:3}); // Shinra, Inc.
Peace Preservation/
Weapon Dev. Research Library

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:2}); // Shinra, Inc.
Space Dev. Research Library

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:40}); // Hart
If you run into President Shinra,
please don't tell him about this.{PAUSE}I can't be a partner to
anymore trouble for Shinra.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:21}); // Domino
But my card will only get you
to the 65th floor.{PAUSE}Can you believe how they treat me?
ME! Like some common employee

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:7}); // Yes, that's it.
Guess the password
and I'll give you my keycard!{PAUSE}Get it on the first try
and I'll even throw in
a special item!

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:8}); // Domino
Got it?{PAUSE}Then tell me.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:12}); // God, I love the sound of that!
BEST!! I AM the bestME!!
No matter what anyone else says,
you'd better believe it.{PAUSE}hmm. Well, OK.
Here, take it.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:20}); // Domino
Why would I do something
like this, you ask?{PAUSE}Revenge, of course!
Shinra's been torturing me forever.{PAUSE}That's why I was a little rough
on you all just now.
Now go up there and really
make them suffer.{PAUSE}This ought to teach them!
Heh heh heh

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:10}); // Domino
Nope! You're ALL wrong!
It's a much better word than that!
Try again!

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:14}); // God, I love the sound of that!
KING!! President Shinra sucks!
I should be King of Midgar!{PAUSE}hmm. Well, OK.
Here, take it.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:20}); // Domino
Why would I do something
like this, you ask?{PAUSE}Revenge, of course!
Shinra's been torturing me forever.{PAUSE}That's why I was a little rough
on you all just now.
Now go up there and really
make them suffer.{PAUSE}This ought to teach them!
Heh heh heh

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:16}); // God, I love the sound of that!
BOMB!! I'm so angry, I'm like
a walking time bomb waiting to explode!{PAUSE}hmm. Well, OK.
Here, take it.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:20}); // Domino
Why would I do something
like this, you ask?{PAUSE}Revenge, of course!
Shinra's been torturing me forever.{PAUSE}That's why I was a little rough
on you all just now.
Now go up there and really
make them suffer.{PAUSE}This ought to teach them!
Heh heh heh

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:18}); // God, I love the sound of that!
MAKO! If I had a lot more of it,
I would be a real Mayor!{PAUSE}hmm. Well, OK.
Here, take it.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:20}); // Domino
Why would I do something
like this, you ask?{PAUSE}Revenge, of course!
Shinra's been torturing me forever.{PAUSE}That's why I was a little rough
on you all just now.
Now go up there and really
make them suffer.{PAUSE}This ought to teach them!
Heh heh heh

dialogStrings: Shinra Bldg. 62f.

Shinra, Inc.
Urban Dev. Research Library

Shinra, Inc.
Space Dev. Research Library

Shinra, Inc.
Peace Preservation/
Weapon Dev. Research Library

Shinra, Inc.
Scientific Research Library

Hart
How do you do?{PAUSE}This is the Midgar Mayor's Office.
Mayor Domino is in his office.{PAUSE}I am the Deputy Mayor.
If you should have any questions
feel free to ask me

Domino
Hmm?
Oh, and who might you be?{PAUSE}You all must be thoseahem
Me? I'm Domino, the Mayor of Midgar.{PAUSE}Actually, I'm Mayor in name only.
The city and everything in it is really
run by Shinra, Inc.{PAUSE}My only real job is watching over
Shinra's documents{PAUSE}Me! The Mayor!
A librarian!
Ohh{PAUSE}You want to get upstairs?
I tell you what, if you can guess the
password, I'll give you my keycard.

Yes, that's it.
Guess the password
and I'll give you my keycard!{PAUSE}Get it on the first try
and I'll even throw in
a special item!

Domino
Got it?{PAUSE}Then tell me.

So, what's the password?
{CHOICE}BEST
{CHOICE}KING
{CHOICE}ORBS
{CHOICE}BOMB
{CHOICE}MAKO
{CHOICE}HOJO
{CHOICE}Wait a second

Domino
Nope! You're ALL wrong!
It's a much better word than that!
Try again!

Domino
BEST!!

God, I love the sound of that!
BEST!! I AM the bestME!!
No matter what anyone else says,
you'd better believe it.{PAUSE}hmm. Well, OK.
Here, take it.

Domino
KING!!

God, I love the sound of that!
KING!! President Shinra sucks!
I should be King of Midgar!{PAUSE}hmm. Well, OK.
Here, take it.

Domino
BOMB!!

God, I love the sound of that!
BOMB!! I'm so angry, I'm like
a walking time bomb waiting to explode!{PAUSE}hmm. Well, OK.
Here, take it.

Domino
MAKO!!

God, I love the sound of that!
MAKO! If I had a lot more of it,
I would be a real Mayor!{PAUSE}hmm. Well, OK.
Here, take it.
Received "Keycard 65"!

Domino
Why would I do something
like this, you ask?{PAUSE}Revenge, of course!
Shinra's been torturing me forever.{PAUSE}That's why I was a little rough
on you all just now.
Now go up there and really
make them suffer.{PAUSE}This ought to teach them!
Heh heh heh

Domino
But my card will only get you
to the 65th floor.{PAUSE}Can you believe how they treat me?
ME! Like some common employee

Hart
Did you speak with the Mayor?{PAUSE}What?
A password?
Oh, I get it{PAUSE}He's got way too much time on his hands.
But you can't really blame him,
Everything in Midgar is controlled
by President Shinra.{PAUSE}Maybe I can help you.

What do you want to know?
{CHOICE}The passwordduh!
{CHOICE}How about a hint?
{CHOICE}Get out of my face

Hart
I see.
Then, I guess that's that.{PAUSE}Good luck
finding it on your own.{PAUSE}If you decide you want help.
I'll just be right over here.
Ready to tell you anytime

What can I do for you?
{CHOICE}Give me the hint again
{CHOICE}Give me the next hint
{CHOICE}Uh, nothing

Hart
Sure, sure.
All right.{PAUSE}As a public servant,
it's my job to serve
the needs of the people.{PAUSE}So here's a hint

for 500 gil.
{CHOICE}Give him the money
{CHOICE}Forget it!

for 1000 gil.
{CHOICE}Give him the money
{CHOICE}Forget it!

for 2000 gil.
{CHOICE}Give him the money
{CHOICE}Forget it!

for 5000 gil.
{CHOICE}Give him the money
{CHOICE}Forget it!

for 15000 gil.
{CHOICE}Give him the money
{CHOICE}Forget it!

Hart
What do you want to know?
{CHOICE}HELP
{CHOICE}Forget it

Hart
Hey now!
You're a bit short.{PAUSE}No one works on credit nowadays
not even stores in the slums.

Hart
I can't believe it! I gave you all
these hints, and you STILL don't get it?{PAUSE}You guys are amazing!
Really, amazing{PAUSE}Well, seeing as things have come to this,
I might as well just tell you.

Hart
Oh, mywell,
Thank you very much.

Now listen.
On this floor are four research libraries
for four different sections of Shinra, Inc.{PAUSE}Parts of the password are hidden
in each of the libraries.{PAUSE}Pay careful attention to the files
in each room.{PAUSE}The name of each library is written
on the plaque outside the door.

Now, in each library will be one file
mixed in from another library.{PAUSE}Look carefully at the numbers
on each file.

There is a number at the beginning
of each file name.{PAUSE}Look at the number on
the files that don't belong
in that library.{PAUSE}Match the number with the letters
in the title of the file.{PAUSE}If the file starts with a 4,
then check the fourth letter and
well, you get the idea.

Hart
What do you mean the next hint?
I've practically told you, didn't I?{PAUSE}all right.
Since this seems like a special case,
I'll give you MY key card!

Hart
If you run into President Shinra,
please don't tell him about this.{PAUSE}I can't be a partner to
anymore trouble for Shinra.

I never thought you'd
get it on the first try{PAUSE}Just goes to show you can't
judge a book by its cover.
Oh well, a promise is a promise.
Take this, too.
Received "Elemental" Materia!

You cannot take on any more Materia.
Please discard some Materia.

Domino
Whatfull already?
Come back again when it's empty.
Received "Elixir"!
Received "Ether"!
Received "Potion"!

Domino
Hmm.
It appears you're not completely stupid.{PAUSE}Fine then, take this.

Domino
I see
For youthis might be best.{PAUSE}Then,
this is for all of you.

Domino
Hoo boy! You finally got it?{PAUSE}You all really don't use
your heads much, do you?{PAUSE}What the hey.
Here, just take it anyway.
